clients.title: Add Your Videos to Google My Business
description: Google My Business (GMB) now allows you to upload videos up to 30 seconds in length to your Google business listing. The videos will display on Google maps and local search listings. Learn more from Google about adding videos to your GMB photos dashboard here.
